parameters.columns: title, city, district, ward, price_million, area_m2, rent_per_sqm_million, lat, lon, type, segment, frontage, floors, views, saved_count, image_url, raw_data

parameters.query: UPDATE listings SET geom = ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(lon, lat), 4326) WHERE geom IS NULL AND lat IS NOT NULL AND lon IS NOT NULL;
